thread.title: BRIEF-Ningbo Peacebird Fashion to invest 23.3 mln yuan in household industry firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ningbo Peacebird Fashion to invest 23.3 mln yuan in household industry firm

organizations.name: reuters) - ningbo peacebird fashion co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Ningbo Peacebird Fashion Co Ltd
* Says it plans to invest 23.3 million yuan in a Zhejiang-based household industry firm
* Says it will hold a 51 percent stake in the household industry firm after the investment
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/oYRhTE
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
